      • search

        private void search()
             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Searches Database with searchTerm. Displays list of resources matching searchTerm in table form.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - fails to connect to Database

                 throws java.io.IOException,

        Throws:
